languages.text: "...Были слова те грозны и исполнены гнева!"

"...And {mf|his|her} words were formidable
and filled with wrath!"
languages.original_text: "...Были слова те грозны и исполнены гнева!"

traits.locale_text:
"...And {mf|his|her} words were formidable
and filled with wrath!"

"...And {mf|his|her} words were formidable
and filled with wrath!"
"...Были слова те грозны и исполнены гнева!"

"...And {mf|his|her} words were formidable
and filled with wrath!"

languages.text:
「そして{mf|彼|彼女}の言葉は力強く
怒りに満ちていた！」
languages.original_text:
"...And {mf|his|her} words were formidable
and filled with wrath!"

traits.locale_text:
「そして{mf|彼|彼女}の言葉は力強く
怒りに満ちていた！」

languages.text:
“……{mf|他|她}吐出骇人的话语，
其中蕴含着无限愤怒！”
languages.original_text:
"...And {mf|his|her} words were formidable
and filled with wrath!"

traits.locale_text:
“……{mf|他|她}吐出骇人的话语，
其中蕴含着无限愤怒！”

languages.text:
« ... et ses mots retentirent,
remplis d'une fureur implacable ! »
languages.original_text:
"...And {mf|his|her} words were formidable
and filled with wrath!"

traits.locale_text:
« ... et ses mots retentirent,
remplis d'une fureur implacable ! »

languages.text:
«... ¡Y sus palabras estaban
de fuerza e ira cargadas!».
languages.original_text:
"...And {mf|his|her} words were formidable
and filled with wrath!"

traits.locale_text:
«... ¡Y sus palabras estaban
de fuerza e ira cargadas!».

languages.text:
"... Und {mf|seine|ihre} Worte waren formidabel
und von Zorn erfüllt!"
languages.original_text:
"...And {mf|his|her} words were formidable
and filled with wrath!"

traits.locale_text:
"... Und {mf|seine|ihre} Worte waren formidabel
und von Zorn erfüllt!"

languages.original_text:
"...And {mf|his|her} words were formidable
and filled with wrath!"
